projectDesc.p: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts aims to establish a corpus of Indic texts marked up according to the guidelines of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI).

interpretation.p: (1) Sanskrit diacritics are entered using the Unicode Standard Encoding (utf-8):
vowels and diphthongs: a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, ṛ, ṝ, ḷ, e, ai, o, au
gutturals: k, kh, g, gh, ṅ
palatals: c, ch, j, jh, ñ
cerebrals: ṭ, ṭh, ḍ, ḍh, ṇ
dentals: t, th, d, dh, n
labials: p, ph, b, bh, m
(3) Members of a compound are separated by periods.

correction.p: The base e-text was typed, analyzed and proofread by R.P. Das and R.E. Emmerick.

refsDecl.p: References to each portion of the Sanskrit text have been placed at the start of each line: e.g., AHS1.9.019a/ refers to Das and Emmerick's edition of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṁhitā, Part 1, Chapter 9, Verse 19, Line 1 - Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., op. cit..
Part and Chapter headings are from: Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī, op. cit..
Page references have been placed in the body of the text at ten verse intervals: e.g., -- 6 -- refers to the SARIT transcript, page 6.

Page references to Kuṇṭe and Navare's edition of the Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Kuṇṭe and Navare's 1902 edition, pages 12 to 18 - Kuṇṭe, A.M. and Navare, K., op. cit..

Page references to Vogel's edition and English translation of the Tibetan and Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Vogel's 1965 edition and translation, pages 82 to 120 - Vogel, Claus, op. cit..

lg.l: AHS1.1.001a/ rāgādi.rogān satatānuṣaktān a.śeṣa.kāya.prasṛtān a.śeṣān |
AHS1.1.001c/ autsukya.mohā.rati.dāñ jaghāna yo '.pūrva.vaidyāya namo 'stu tasmai || 1 ||
AHS1.1.002a/ āyuḥ.kāmayamānena dharmārtha.sukha.sādhanam |
AHS1.1.002c/ āyur.vedopadeśeṣu vidheyaḥ param ādaraḥ || 2 ||
AHS1.1.003a/ brahmā smṛtvāyuṣo vedaṁ prajāpatim ajigrahat |
AHS1.1.003c/ so 'śvinau tau sahasrākṣaṁ so 'tri.putrādikān munīn || 3 ||
AHS1.1.004a/ te 'gniveśādikāṁs te tu pṛthak tantrāṇi tenire |
AHS1.1.004c/ tebhyo 'ti.viprakīrṇebhyaḥ prāyaḥ sāra.taroccayaḥ || 4 ||
AHS1.1.005a/ kriyate 'ṣṭāṅga.hṛdayaṁ nāti.saṅkṣepa.vistaram |
AHS1.1.005c/ kāya.bāla.grahordhvāṅga.śalya.daṁṣṭrā.jarā.vṛṣān || 5 || AHS1.1.005v/ 1.5bv nāti.saṅkṣipta.vistṛtam
AHS1.1.006a/ aṣṭāv aṅgāni tasyāhuś cikitsā yeṣu saṁśritā |
AHS1.1.006c/ vāyuḥ pittaṁ kaphaś ceti trayo doṣāḥ samāsataḥ || 6 ||
AHS1.1.007a/ vikṛtā.vikṛtā dehaṁ ghnanti te vartayanti ca |
AHS1.1.007c/ te vyāpino 'pi hṛn.nābhyor adho.madhyordhva.saṁśrayāḥ || 7 || AHS1.1.007v/ 1.7bv ghnanti te vardhayanti ca
AHS1.1.008a/ vayo.'ho.rātri.bhuktānāṁ te 'nta.madhyādi.gāḥ kramāt |
AHS1.1.008c/ tair bhaved viṣamas tīkṣṇo mandaś cāgniḥ samaiḥ samaḥ || 8 ||
AHS1.1.009a/ koṣṭhaḥ krūro mṛdur madhyo madhyaḥ syāt taiḥ samair api |
AHS1.1.009c/ śukrārtava.sthair janmādau viṣeṇeva viṣa.krimeḥ || 9 ||
AHS1.1.010a/ taiś ca tisraḥ prakṛtayo hīna.madhyottamāḥ pṛthak |
AHS1.1.010c/ sama.dhātuḥ samastāsu śreṣṭhā nindyā dvi.doṣa.jāḥ || 10 || AHS1.1.010v/ 1.10cv sama.dhātuḥ samais tāsu
AHS1.1.011a/ tatra rūkṣo laghuḥ śītaḥ kharaḥ sūkṣmaś calo 'nilaḥ |
AHS1.1.011c/ pittaṁ sa.sneha.tīkṣṇoṣṇaṁ laghu visraṁ saraṁ dravam || 11 ||
AHS1.1.012a/ snigdhaḥ śīto gurur mandaḥ ślakṣṇo mṛtsnaḥ sthiraḥ kaphaḥ |
AHS1.1.012c/ saṁsargaḥ sannipātaś ca tad.dvi.tri.kṣaya.kopataḥ || 12 ||
AHS1.1.013a/ rasāsṛṅ.māṁsa.medo.'sthi.majja.śukrāṇi dhātavaḥ |
AHS1.1.013c/ sapta dūṣyā malā mūtra.śakṛt.svedādayo 'pi ca || 13 ||
AHS1.1.014a/ vṛddhiḥ samānaiḥ sarveṣāṁ viparītair viparyayaḥ |
AHS1.1.014c/ rasāḥ svādv.amla.lavaṇa.tiktoṣaṇa.kaṣāyakāḥ || 14 ||
AHS1.1.015a/ ṣaḍ dravyam āśritās te ca yathā.pūrvaṁ balāvahāḥ |
AHS1.1.015c/ tatrādyā mārutaṁ ghnanti trayas tiktādayaḥ kapham || 15 ||
AHS1.1.016a/ kaṣāya.tikta.madhurāḥ pittam anye tu kurvate |
AHS1.1.016c/ śamanaṁ kopanaṁ svastha.hitaṁ dravyam iti tri.dhā || 16 ||
AHS1.1.017a/ uṣṇa.śīta.guṇotkarṣāt tatra vīryaṁ dvi.dhā smṛtam |
AHS1.1.017c/ tri.dhā vipāko dravyasya svādv.amla.kaṭukātmakaḥ || 17 ||
AHS1.1.018a/ guru.manda.hima.snigdha.ślakṣṇa.sāndra.mṛdu.sthirāḥ |
AHS1.1.018c/ guṇāḥ sa.sūkṣma.viśadā viṁśatiḥ sa.viparyayāḥ || 18 ||
AHS1.1.019a/ kālārtha.karmaṇāṁ yogo hīna.mithyāti.mātrakaḥ |
AHS1.1.019c/ samyag.yogaś ca vijñeyo rogārogyaika.kāraṇam || 19 ||
AHS1.1.020a/ rogas tu doṣa.vaiṣamyaṁ doṣa.sāmyam a.roga.tā |
AHS1.1.020c/ nijāgantu.vibhāgena tatra rogā dvi.dhā smṛtāḥ || 20 ||
AHS1.1.021a/ teṣāṁ kāya.mano.bhedād adhiṣṭhānam api dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.021c/ rajas tamaś ca manaso dvau ca doṣāv udāhṛtau || 21 || AHS1.1.021v/ 1.21dv 'tra dvau doṣāv udāhṛtau
AHS1.1.022a/ darśana.sparśana.praśnaiḥ parīkṣeta ca rogiṇam |
AHS1.1.022c/ rogaṁ nidāna.prāg.rūpa.lakṣaṇopaśayāptibhiḥ || 22 || AHS1.1.022v/ 1.22bv samparīkṣeta rogiṇam 1.22bv parīkṣetātha rogiṇam
AHS1.1.023a/ bhūmi.deha.prabhedena deśam āhur iha dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.023c/ jāṅgalaṁ vāta.bhūyiṣṭham anūpaṁ tu kapholbaṇam || 23 ||
AHS1.1.024a/ sādhāraṇaṁ sama.malaṁ tri.dhā bhū.deśam ādiśet |
AHS1.1.024c/ kṣaṇādir vyādhy.avasthā ca kālo bheṣaja.yoga.kṛt || 24 ||
AHS1.1.025a/ śodhanaṁ śamanaṁ ceti samāsād auṣadhaṁ dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.025c/ śarīra.jānāṁ doṣāṇāṁ krameṇa paramauṣadham || 25 ||
AHS1.1.026a/ vastir vireko vamanaṁ tathā tailaṁ ghṛtaṁ madhu |
AHS1.1.026c/ dhī.dhairyātmādi.vijñānaṁ mano.doṣauṣadhaṁ param || 26 ||
AHS1.1.027a/ bhiṣag dravyāṇy upasthātā rogī pāda.catuṣṭayam |
AHS1.1.027c/ cikitsitasya nirdiṣṭaṁ praty.ekaṁ tac catur.guṇam || 27 ||
AHS1.1.028a/ dakṣas tīrthātta.śāstrārtho dṛṣṭa.karmā śucir bhiṣak |
AHS1.1.028c/ bahu.kalpaṁ bahu.guṇaṁ sampannaṁ yogyam auṣadham || 28 ||
AHS1.1.029a/ anuraktaḥ śucir dakṣo buddhi.mān paricārakaḥ |
AHS1.1.029c/ āḍhyo rogī bhiṣag.vaśyo jñāpakaḥ sat.tva.vān api || 29 ||
AHS1.1.029+(1)a/ sādhyo '.sādhya iti vyādhir dvi.dhā tau tu punar dvi.dhā |
AHS1.1.029+(1)c/ su.sādhyaḥ kṛcchra.sādhyaś ca yāpyo yaś cān.upakramaḥ || 29+(1) ||
AHS1.1.030a/ sarvauṣadha.kṣame dehe yūnaḥ puṁso jitātmanaḥ |
AHS1.1.030c/ a.marma.go 'lpa.hetv.agra.rūpa.rūpo 'n.upadravaḥ || 30 ||
AHS1.1.031a/ a.tulya.dūṣya.deśartu.prakṛtiḥ pāda.sampadi |
AHS1.1.031c/ graheṣv anu.guṇeṣv eka.doṣa.mārgo navaḥ sukhaḥ || 31 ||
AHS1.1.032a/ śastrādi.sādhanaḥ kṛcchraḥ saṅkare ca tato gadaḥ |
AHS1.1.032c/ śeṣa.tvād āyuṣo yāpyaḥ pathyābhyāsād viparyaye || 32 ||
AHS1.1.033a/ an.upakrama eva syāt sthito 'ty.anta.viparyaye |
AHS1.1.033c/ autsukya.mohā.rati.kṛd dṛṣṭa.riṣṭo 'kṣa.nāśanaḥ || 33 ||
AHS1.1.034a/ tyajed ārtaṁ bhiṣag.bhūpair dviṣṭaṁ teṣāṁ dviṣaṁ dviṣam |
AHS1.1.034c/ hīnopakaraṇaṁ vyagram a.vidheyaṁ gatāyuṣam || 34 ||
AHS1.1.035a/ caṇḍaṁ śokāturaṁ bhīruṁ kṛta.ghnaṁ vaidya.māninam |
AHS1.1.035c/ tantrasyāsya paraṁ cāto vakṣyate 'dhyāya.saṅgrahaḥ || 35 ||
AHS1.1.036a/ āyuṣ.kāma.dinartv.īhā.rogān.utpādana.dravāḥ |

AHS6.40.052c/ guḍamañjaryāḥ khapuro nasyāt skandhāṁsa.bāhu.rujam || 52 || AHS6.40.052v/ 40.52dv nasyaṁ skandhāṁsa.bāhu.rujam
AHS6.40.053a/ nava.nīta.khaṇḍa.marditam auṣṭraṁ mūtraṁ payaś ca hanty udaram |

AHS6.40.053c/ nasyaṁ mūrdha.vikārān vidradhim a.cirotthitam asra.visrāvaḥ || 53 || AHS6.40.053v/ 40.53bv auṣṭrī.mūtraṁ payaś ca hanty udaram 40.53cv nasyaṁ cordhva.vikārān 40.53cv nasyaṁ mūrdhni vikārān
AHS6.40.054a/ nasyaṁ kavaḍo mukha.jān nasyāñjana.tarpaṇāni netra.rujaḥ |
AHS6.40.054c/ vṛddhasya kṣīra.ghṛte mūrchāṁ śītāmbu.māruta.cchāyāḥ || 54 || AHS6.40.054v/ 40.54av nasyaṁ kavaḍaṁ mukha.gadān 40.54av nasyaṁ kevalaṁ mukha.gadān 40.54av nasyaṁ kavaḍaṁ mukha.jān
AHS6.40.055a/ sama.śuktārdraka.mātrā mande vahnau śrame surā snānam |

AHS6.40.055c/ duḥkha.saha.tve sthairye vyāyāmo gokṣurur hitaḥ kṛcchre || 55 || AHS6.40.055v/ 40.55av sama.śuṣkārdraka.mātrā 40.55bv mande vahnau śrame surā.pānam 40.55cv duḥkha.saha.tvaṁ sthairye 40.55cv duḥkha.saha.tvaṁ sthaulye
AHS6.40.056a/ kāse nidigdhikā pārśva.śūle puṣkara.jā jaṭā |
AHS6.40.056c/ vayasaḥ sthāpane dhātrī tri.phalā guggulur vraṇe || 56 || AHS6.40.056v/ 40.56av kāse nidigdhikā.pānaṁ 40.56bv pārśva.śūle ca pauṣkaram 40.56cv vayaḥ.saṁsthāpane dhātrī
AHS6.40.057a/ vastir vāta.vikārān paittān rekaḥ kaphodbhavān vamanam |
AHS6.40.057c/ kṣaudraṁ jayati balāsaṁ sarpiḥ pittaṁ samīraṇaṁ tailam || 57 ||
AHS6.40.058a/ ity agryaṁ yat proktaṁ rogāṇām auṣadhaṁ śamāyālam |
AHS6.40.058c/ tad deśa.kāla.balato vikalpanīyaṁ yathā.yogam || 58 ||
AHS6.40.059a/ ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha.sūtraṁ tat.sūktānāṁ peśalānām a.tṛptaḥ |

AHS6.40.059c/ bheḍādīnāṁ sammato bhakti.namraḥ papracchedaṁ saṁśayāno 'gniveśaḥ || 59 || AHS6.40.059v/ 40.59av ity ātreyād āgamād ārtha.sūkṣmaṁ 40.59av ity ātreyād āgamayyārtha.sūkṣmaṁ 40.59bv tat.sūktīnāṁ peśalānām a.tṛptaḥ
AHS6.40.060a/ dṛśyante bhaga.van ke.cid ātma.vanto 'pi rogiṇaḥ |
AHS6.40.060c/ dravyopasthātṛ.sampannā vṛddha.vaidya.matānugāḥ || 60 ||
AHS6.40.061a/ kṣīyamāṇāmaya.prāṇā viparītās tathā 'pare |
AHS6.40.061c/ hitā.hita.vibhāgasya phalaṁ tasmād a.niścitam || 61 ||
AHS6.40.062a/ kiṁ śāsti śāstram asmin iti kalpayato 'gniveśa.mukhyasya |
AHS6.40.062c/ śiṣya.gaṇasya punarvasur ācakhyau kārtsnyatas tat.tvam || 62 || AHS6.40.062v/ 40.62dv ācakṣe kārtsnyatas tat.tvam
AHS6.40.063a/ na cikitsā.cikitsā ca tulyā bhavitum arhati |
AHS6.40.063c/ vināpi kriyayā svāsthyaṁ gacchatāṁ ṣo.ḍaśāṁśayā || 63 ||
AHS6.40.064a/ ātaṅka.paṅka.magnānāṁ hastālambo bhiṣag.jitam |
AHS6.40.064c/ jīvitaṁ mriyamāṇānāṁ sarveṣām eva nauṣadhāt || 64 || AHS6.40.064v/ 40.64dv sarveṣām eva nauṣadham
AHS6.40.065a/ na hy upāyam apekṣante sarve rogā na cānya.thā |
AHS6.40.065c/ upāya.sādhyāḥ sidhyanti nā.hetur hetu.mān yataḥ || 65 || AHS6.40.065v/ 40.65dv no '.hetur hetu.māṁs tataḥ
AHS6.40.066a/ yad uktaṁ sarva.sampatti.yuktayāpi cikitsayā |
AHS6.40.066c/ mṛtyur bhavati tan naivaṁ nopāye 'sty an.upāya.tā || 66 || AHS6.40.066v/ 40.66dv nopāyeṣv an.upāya.tā
AHS6.40.067a/ api copāya.yuktasya dhī.mato jātu cit kriyā |
AHS6.40.067c/ na sidhyed daiva.vaiguṇyān na tv iyaṁ ṣo.ḍaśātmikā || 67 || AHS6.40.067v/ 40.67av apy evopāya.yuktasya 40.67cv na siddhir daiva.vaiguṇyān 40.67dv na nv iyaṁ ṣo.ḍaśātmikā
AHS6.40.068a/ kasyā.siddho 'gni.toyādiḥ sveda.stambhādi.karmaṇi |
AHS6.40.068c/ na prīṇanaṁ karṣaṇaṁ vā kasya kṣīraṁ gavedhukam || 68 || AHS6.40.068v/ 40.68cv na prīṇanaṁ karśanaṁ vā 40.68dv kasya kṣīra.gavedhukam
AHS6.40.069a/ kasya māṣātmaguptādau vṛṣya.tve nāsti niścayaḥ |
AHS6.40.069c/ viṇ.mūtra.karaṇākṣepau kasya saṁśayitau yave || 69 || AHS6.40.069v/ 40.69av kasya māṣātmaguptādyair 40.69bv vṛṣa.tve nāsti niścayaḥ
AHS6.40.070a/ viṣaṁ kasya jarāṁ yāti mantra.tantra.vivarjitam |
AHS6.40.070c/ kaḥ prāptaḥ kalya.tāṁ pathyād ṛte rohiṇikādiṣu || 70 || AHS6.40.070v/ 40.70cv kaḥ prāptaḥ kalpa.tāṁ pathyād
AHS6.40.071a/ api cā.kāla.maraṇaṁ sarva.siddhānta.niścitam |
AHS6.40.071c/ mahatāpi prayatnena vāryatāṁ katham anya.thā || 71 ||
AHS6.40.072a/ candanādy api dāhādau rūḍham āgama.pūrvakam |
AHS6.40.072c/ śāstrād eva gataṁ siddhiṁ jvare laṅghana.bṛṁhaṇam || 72 ||
AHS6.40.073a/ catuṣ.pād.guṇa.sampanne samyag ālocya yojite |
AHS6.40.073c/ mā kṛthā vyādhi.nirghātaṁ vicikitsāṁ cikitsite || 73 || AHS6.40.073v/ 40.73av catuṣ.pād.guṇa.sampūrṇe 40.73cv mā kṛthā vyādhi.nirghāte
AHS6.40.074a/ etad dhi mṛtyu.pāśānām a.kāṇḍe chedanaṁ dṛḍham |
AHS6.40.074c/ rogottrāsita.bhītānāṁ rakṣā.sūtram a.sūtrakam || 74 ||
AHS6.40.075a/ etat tad amṛtaṁ sākṣāj jagad.āyāsa.varjitam |
AHS6.40.075c/ yāti hālāhala.tvaṁ tu sadyo dur.bhājana.sthitam || 75 || AHS6.40.075v/ 40.75av etad vedāmṛtaṁ sākṣāj 40.75bv jagaty āyāsa.varjitam 40.75cv yāti hālāhala.tvaṁ ca
AHS6.40.076a/ a.jñāta.śāstra.sad.bhāvāñ chāstra.mātra.parāyaṇān |
AHS6.40.076c/ tyajed dūrād bhiṣak.pāśān pāśān vaivasvatān iva || 76 || AHS6.40.076v/ 40.76cv vivarjayed bhiṣak.pāśān
AHS6.40.077a/ bhiṣajāṁ sādhu.vṛttānāṁ bhadram āgama.śālinām |
AHS6.40.077c/ abhyasta.karmaṇāṁ bhadraṁ bhadraṁ bhadrābhilāṣiṇām || 77 || AHS6.40.077v/ 40.77bv bahu.dhāgama.śālinām 40.77bv bhadram āgama.śīlinām 40.77cv abhyasta.karmaṇāṁ siddhir
AHS6.40.078a/ iti tantra.guṇair yuktaṁ tantra.doṣair vivarjitam |
AHS6.40.078c/ cikitsā.śāstram a.khilaṁ vyāpya yat paritaḥ sthitam || 78 || AHS6.40.078v/ 40.78bv tantra.doṣa.vivarjitam 40.78dv vyāpaṭhya paritaḥ sthitam
AHS6.40.079a/ vipulā.mala.vijñāna.mahā.muni.matānugam |

AHS6.40.079c/ mahā.sāgara.gambhīra.saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam || 79 || AHS6.40.079v/ 40.79av vipulā.mala.vijñānaṁ 40.79cv mahā.sāgara.gambhīraṁ 40.79cv mahā.muni.matānugam 40.79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣaṇam 40.79dv saṅgrahārthopalakṣakam
AHS6.40.080a/ aṣṭāṅga.vaidyaka.mahodadhi.manthanena yo 'ṣṭāṅga.saṅgraha.mahāmṛta.rāśir āptaḥ |

AHS6.40.080c/ tasmād an.alpa.phalam alpa.samudyamānāṁ prīty.artham etad uditaṁ pṛthag eva tantram || 80 || AHS6.40.080v/ 40.80bv yo 'ṣṭāṅga.saṅgraha.mahāmṛta.sāra.tulyaḥ 40.80dv prīty.artham evam uditaṁ pṛthag eva tantram
AHS6.40.081a/ idam āgama.siddha.tvāt pratyakṣa.phala.darśanāt |
AHS6.40.081c/ mantra.vat samprayoktavyaṁ na mīmāṁsyaṁ kathañ.ca.na || 81 || AHS6.40.081v/ 40.81av idam āgama.śuddha.tvāt 40.81dv na mīmāṁsyaṁ kadā.ca.na
AHS6.40.082a/ dīrgha.jīvitam ārogyaṁ dharmam arthaṁ sukhaṁ yaśaḥ |
AHS6.40.082c/ pāṭhāvabodhānuṣṭhānair adhigacchaty ato dhruvam || 82 || AHS6.40.082v/ 40.82av dīrghaṁ jīvitam ārogyaṁ
AHS6.40.083a/ etat paṭhan saṅgraha.bodha.śaktaḥ sv.abhyasta.karmā bhiṣag a.prakampyaḥ |
AHS6.40.083c/ ākampayaty anya.viśāla.tantra.kṛtābhiyogān yadi tan na citram || 83 || AHS6.40.083v/ 40.83cv yaḥ kampayaty anya.viśāla.tantra.
AHS6.40.084a/ yadi carakam adhīte tad dhruvaṁ suśrutādi.praṇigadita.gadānāṁ nāma.mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ |

AHS6.40.084c/ atha caraka.vihīnaḥ prakriyāyām a.klinnaḥ kim iva khalu karotu vyādhitānāṁ varākaḥ || 84 || AHS6.40.084v/ 40.84bv .praṇigadita.gadānāṁ nāma.mātreṇa bāhyaḥ 40.84bv .pratigadita.gadānāṁ nāma.mātre 'pi bāhyaḥ 40.84dv kim iha khalu karotu vyādhitānāṁ varākaḥ
AHS6.40.085a/ abhiniveśa.vaśād abhiyujyate su.bhaṇite 'pi na yo dṛḍha.mūḍhakaḥ |
AHS6.40.085c/ paṭhatu yatna.paraḥ puruṣāyuṣaṁ sa khalu vaidyakam ādyam a.nirvidaḥ || 85 ||
AHS6.40.086a/ vāte pitte śleṣma.śāntau ca pathyaṁ tailaṁ sarpir mākṣikaṁ ca krameṇa |
AHS6.40.086c/ etad brahmā bhāṣatāṁ brahma.jo vā kā nir.mantre vaktṛ.bhedokti.śaktiḥ || 86 || AHS6.40.086v/ 40.86cv etad brahmā bhāṣate brahma.jo vā
AHS6.40.087a/ abhidhātṛ.vaśāt kiṁ vā dravya.śaktir viśiṣyate |
AHS6.40.087c/ ato matsaram utsṛjya mādhyasthyam avalambyatām || 87 || AHS6.40.087v/ 40.87av abhidhātur vaśāt kiñ.cid
AHS6.40.088a/ ṛṣi.praṇīte prītiś cen muktvā caraka.suśrutau |
AHS6.40.088c/ bheḍādyāḥ kiṁ na paṭhyante tasmād grāhyaṁ su.bhāṣitam || 88 ||
AHS6.40.089a/ hṛdayam iva hṛdayam etat sarvāyur.veda.vāṅ.maya.payo.dheḥ |
AHS6.40.089c/ kṛtvā yac chubham āptaṁ śubham astu paraṁ tato jagataḥ || 89 ||

row.cell: R.P. Das and R.E. Emmerick ; R.B. Mahoney
SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts

Vāgbhaṭa's Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṁhitā - SARIT transcript, Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., compilation and editing, Mahoney, R.B., editing and conversion to TEI markup, (London: SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts, 2009), Id. No. 0001-00000003.
UTF-8 encoded XML file ; approx. 2573000 bytes

The base e-text was: Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., editors, A machine-readable transcription of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdaya by Vāgbhaṭa, (London: INDOLOGY: Resources for Indological Scholarship, 1997), CSX encoded text file (ah-raw.csx); approx. 1020150 bytes.
The base e-text was subsequently published as: Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., editors, Vāgbhaṭa's Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā: the romanised text accompanied by line and word indexes, (Groningen: Egbert Forsten, 1998).
The SARIT transcript of the base e-text was correlated with: 1.) Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī, editors, Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayam: sūtra-śārīra-nidāna-cikitsā-kalpa-uttarasthānavibhaktam: Aruṇadattapraṇītayā Sarvāṅgasundarākhyayā vyākhyayā samalaṅkṛtam [The Astângahṛidaya: a compendium of the Hindu system of medicine: with the commentary of Aruṇadatta: including sûtra, nidân, chikitsâ, kalpa and uttara], (Mumbayyām: Nirṇaya-sāgara Press, 1902); and 2.) Vogel, Claus, editor, Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā: the first five chapters of its Tibetan version, edited and rendered into English along with the original Sanskrit, ([Marburg] / Wiesbaden: Deutsche Morgenländische Gesellschaft / Steiner [in Komm.], 1965).

Members of a compound are separated by periods.

References to each portion of the Sanskrit text have been placed at the start of each line: e.g., AHS1.9.019a/ refers to Das and Emmerick's edition of the Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṁhitā, Part 1, Chapter 9, Verse 19, Line 1 - Das, R.P. and Emmerick, R.E., op. cit..
Part and Chapter headings are from: Kuṇṭe, Aṇṇā Moreśvara and Navare, Kṛṣṇaśāstrī, op. cit..
Page references have been placed in the body of the text at ten verse intervals: e.g., -- 6 -- refers to the SARIT transcript, page 6.

Page references to Kuṇṭe and Navare's edition of the Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Kuṇṭe and Navare's 1902 edition, pages 12 to 18 - Kuṇṭe, A.M. and Navare, K., op. cit..

Page references to Vogel's edition and English translation of the Tibetan and Sanskrit text have been placed below and to the right of the section headings: e.g., [ K edn 12-18 :: V edn & tr. 82-120 refers to Vogel's 1965 edition and translation, pages 82 to 120 - Vogel, Claus, op. cit..
